channel.title: Need help
channel.description:

All help appreciated!!![br][size=1]Posted on: May 24, 2007, 04:54:22 PM[/size][hr]can any1 help??

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Sonis Sonis
item.description:
@Sonis wrote:

search for this floor
should look similar to this public int getXPForLevel(int level) { int points = 0; int output = 0; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); if (lvl >= level) { return output; } output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); } return 0; } public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 99; }
Make sure that its (“getLevelForXP” or “getXPForLevel”) and not (“getSummonLvlForXP” or “getSummonXPForLevel”).
Next just Delete yours And replance with mine. XP for 99: 13034431

Also Thefor (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
This Is where you set max stat. Also check to change the return 99; to the stat You want.

Read full topic
